passages.name: start
passages.text:
@@font-family: 'Alegreya Sans SC', sans-serif;salt is best experienced with headphones and a keyboard.@@
<><><>

passages.name: tut up
passages.text:
<<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Good...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...if you stop, or become too tired, you'll surface...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and your thoughts are lost...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...try stopping now.
<<repeat 50ms>><<if $energy <= -10>><<goto "surface1">><</if>><</repeat>>
<</replace>><</timed>>

passages.name: tut down
passages.text:
<<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Good...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...if you stop, or become too tired, you'll surface...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and your thoughts are lost...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...try stopping now.
<<repeat 50ms>><<if $energy <= -10>><<goto "surface1">><</if>><</repeat>>
<</replace>><</timed>>

passages.name: swim2
passages.text: <

passages.name: holdon up
passages.text:
<<audio "layer2" volume 0 fadeoverto 5 1>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>A handful of questions...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...the creeping sense of time passing...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...shrouded in senseless lists of things to be done.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
And then, something else, deep below...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...something you dare not touch.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
It has been a hard year.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>A year where, for the first time, you felt yourself disappearing.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Fading into the background hum of a thousand unfinished things.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Dissolving into your own life.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Before you entered the sea...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...you fixed your eyes on the other shore...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...across the turquoise gulf.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
An imagined target.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>There is a weight to the water...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and you surge against it...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...outrunning the trailing shore.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
The effort coheres you...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...pushes you down into some compact, muscular thing.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>You push harder....

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...as if force alone...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...could strip dead weight...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and make a life livable.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>><</timed>>

passages.name: letgo down
passages.text:
<<audio "layer2" volume 0 fadeoverto 5 1>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>You let go.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
You flex out your hands as you move them ahead of you...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and watch the ripples of golden light play across them...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...the sun's blinding heat dulled by the water.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
It has been a hard year.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>A year where, for the first time, you felt yourself disappearing.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Fading into the background hum of a thousand unfinished things.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>But you are letting go of that...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...forcing open some cold vault to the warmth that surrounds you.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Before you entered the sea...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...from the edge of the beach...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...you caught the loose shape of the other shore...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...across the gulf.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
An imagined escape. 
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>On the beach were figures too...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...those you have left behind...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...they seem bright now, burnt out...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...as if the sea was dissolving their image...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...the details bleached bone white.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Faded faces.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Eaten away...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...by a chemical, burning white.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>The white of salt.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>><</timed>>

passages.name: surface2
passages.text: <

passages.name: swim3
passages.text: <

passages.name: surface3
passages.text: <

passages.name: watch up
passages.text: <

passages.name: dive down
passages.text: <

passages.name: dive down2
passages.text:
<<audio "layer3" volume 0 fadeoverto 5 1>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>Your thoughts surge down, through clouds of fish...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and the cold surrounds you...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Salt fills your nostrils as the walls take form...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...you reach out to them...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...close enough now to see their complexity...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...carved with ornate forms that fill your vision.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>A doorway opens ahead...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...a dark aperture in the sand and water... 
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and out of that dark spool eels...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...glassy eyed and straggle-toothed...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...you panic as they whip past...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...cold flesh rippling against your trailing legs...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and then you are inside...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...the rooms overgrown but recognisable...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...water thick with heavy silt and dead matter...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...salt-skinned furniture scuttled over by jointed limbs...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and through a sagging door...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...green with growing things...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...your childhood room...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...where you sit, and begin to play...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...at forgetting.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>><</timed>>

passages.name: stay up2
passages.text:
<<audio "layer3" volume 0 fadeoverto 5 1>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>You let them fade into the sand and silt.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
The fish still flicker, but the light receeds...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and the cold rises up in twisting currents...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...to touch your feet.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>You kick it off...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...strike out at it.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>You know what lies below...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...because you brought it with you...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...into this blue and borderless place.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
The need to drown...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...to disappear...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and the means to do so.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Memories, fantasies, carefully cultivated...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and the belief that...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...some place or world you never truly knew...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...but which you touched...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...is lost.
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>><</timed>>

passages.name: streets up2
passages.text:
<<audio "layer3" volume 0 fadeoverto 5 1>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>Your mind twists away between the walls...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...gliding between the carved and flowing forms...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>... of eroded sculptures and collapsed rooms.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
The cold drifts up out of the passageways like ink or oil...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...spiralling around your body...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and some dark, smooth, limbless shape...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...disappears around a corner.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...you give chase, rushing forward...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...through the closing cold...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...that grips you like a vice...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...desperate to uncover some beautiful unknown...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...rounding corner after corner...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...your vision a blur of decaying architecture...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...each room housing a world...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...of fronds and leaves and corals...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and those delicate creatures that attend them...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and each world promising wonder...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...that quickly fades...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...so you surge on...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...eyes near blind with salt...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...through dead streets...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...in a dying world.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>><</timed>>

passages.name: entrance down2
passages.text:
<<audio "layer3" volume 0 fadeoverto 5 1>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>Your thoughts flow into the shadows...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...the cold seeping into your skin...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and a doorway catches your eye, dark against the dying light.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
You surge towards it...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and out of its dark spool eels...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...glassy eyed and straggle-toothed...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...they curl away into the streets...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...like smooth, limbless, black cats..
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and you enter the house...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...the rooms instantly recognisable...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...oddly clean in all that cloying sand...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and through an open door...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...into your childhood room...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...where you sit and begin to play...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...as time stretches out...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and jointed legs scuttle across your back...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...as the eels curl up around your ankles...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and you become green with growing things...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and the echoes of your life on land...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...fade and falter...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...as your eyes glaze over...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...with a white film...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...of acrid salt.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>><</timed>>

passages.name: breathe2
passages.text: <><>

passages.name: swim4
passages.text: <

passages.name: focus up
passages.text:
<<audio "layer3alt" volume 0 fadeoverto 10 1>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>You know the dangers of forgetting...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...the dark formless things that move into the spaces left behind.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>You refocus on the things that are close...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...the rhythm of your strokes...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...the shape of your body in the water...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and things that are distant...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...the texture of skin which is not your own.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
You always remember the physical things first...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...moments of contact, like an eyelash flicker against your cheek...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...or the muscular pressure of another living body...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>but they fade quickly after recall...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...like the resonant waves of struck metal...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...that grow dull by the second.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
What replaces them is more difficult.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Guilt and fear, and self-presevation...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...undercut by the returning patterns of life.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
It's cold now.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">> And you have forgotten why you came out here.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Were you just going to keep swimming?
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>You are too far...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and yet you go on...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...a tiny shape receeding...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...in the eyes of the only ones who love you.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Stop.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Stop now.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>It's so cold.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Please stop.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Please.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>You keep going because you can.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
The truth of it is obvious.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>You don't want to be free...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...you don't know what you want...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...but is it there? Ahead?

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Like two bodies about to touch?

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<</timed>>

passages.name: forget down
passages.text:
<<audio "layer3alt" volume 0 fadeoverto 10 1>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>
<<timed 3s>><<replace "#thoughts">>It's so easy at first...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...a weight lifting from your shoulders...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...you flex more, pull forward faster...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...and you reach out further than before...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...touching the edges of the turquoise...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...nerves igniting like struck matches.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>You glance it first at a distance...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...a dark shape hovering in the blue...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...and it is blue now...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...the turquoise sapped away by the slow cold...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>It turns as you approach...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...sending a chill down your spine...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...its soft fins realigning it in the water with ease.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
This is its sea.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>A sea it watches with the open eyes of the dead...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...with glassy stillness, and cold blood.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
As you come closer its dead eyes glimmer with a gelatine softness...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>..and its body holds steady in the current.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Don't go closer. 

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Please stop.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Please.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>You approach.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
You have never seen anything like it...
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>...this creature so distinct from the pictures, the diagrams...

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
...that in its presence, you cannot identify it.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>It has a life you cannot touch.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Of not knowing.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Of oceans to slice through.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Of voids to dive deep within.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>All the wonders we will never approach.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
In the last metres you panic.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Fuck.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Fuck this.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Get out.

<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>
Jesus fucking christ.
<</replace>>\
<<next>><<replace "#thoughts">>Fuck. Stop.
<</replace>>\
<</timed>>

passages.name: surface4
passages.text: <

passages.name: go on1
passages.text:
<>
<><><>
You fix your eyes on the distant shore.
<>
<><><> <><>\<>

passages.name: turn back1
passages.text:
<>
<><><>
You turn back to face the beach.
<>
<><><> <><>\<>

passages.name: swim5
passages.text: <

passages.name: swimback
passages.text: <

passages.name: fight
passages.text: <

passages.name: salt1
passages.text:
<><>You breathe. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>You emerge in the warm shallows. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>The water is flat, pearly, around your waist. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>You walk out of the sea. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>The cold of the night meets you. <>\ <><> It refreshes you. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>The last light is fading from the purple sky. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>You feel the wind at your back. Even through the salt. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>That sticky layer that remains after every swim. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>You will wash it off in the warmth of the shower. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>You know that may not rinse it. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>It is in your bones now. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>Some figures come down the path... <>\ <><> ...through the chirping forest. <>\ <><> <>\ <><>The crickets are starting up their dusk songs... <>\ <><>...and you walk into the waves of sound... <>\ <><> ...towards the descending crowd... <>\ <><>...looking for the faces you know. <>\ <><> <>\ <><> <>\ <><> <> <><>
<>
<>

passages.name: salt4
passages.text: <

passages.name: drown
passages.text: <

passages.name: fight2
passages.text: <> <> <><>Where are you going? <>\ <><> What are you imagining will happen now? <>\ <><>You are already tiring. <>\ <><> You are already done. <>\ <><><><><> <><><> <>\ <>

passages.name: fight3
passages.text: <

passages.name: fight4
passages.text: <> <> <><>Below your feet leviathans surge... <>\ <><> ...curling down into the blackest waters... <>\ <><>...as a dog curls up at the fire... <>\ <><> ...and sinks into a fevered sleep. <>\ <><><><><> <><><> <>\ <>

passages.name: breathe
passages.text: <><>

passages.name: StoryInit
passages.text:
<<cacheaudio "breath" "http://www.jumpovertheage.com/Salt/Breathshort.wav">>
<<cacheaudio "layer1" "http://www.jumpovertheage.com/Salt/Layer1.wav">>
<<cacheaudio "layer2" "http://www.jumpovertheage.com/Salt/Layer2.wav">>
<<cacheaudio "layer3" "http://www.jumpovertheage.com/Salt/Layer3.wav">>
